Token.Abstract: NSFileManager category methods for Kobold Kit
The absolute path to the file or nil if the file could not be found.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The absolute path to the file or nil if the file could not be found.The path to the file or nil if the file couldn't be found in the bundle.

Token.Abstract: The absolute path to the file.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The absolute path to the file.The path to the file or nil if the file couldn't be found in the user's documents directory.

Token.Abstract: Searches for the file in the given NSSearchPathDirectory and returns the absolute path to the file if it was found.

Parameter.Name: directory
Parameter.Abstract: The NSSearchPathDirectory constant where to look for the file.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The absolute path to the file, or nil if the file could not be found.The path to the file or nil if the file couldn't be found in the directory.

Token.Abstract: Searches for the file in the documents directory first, before trying the bundle and returns the absolute path to the file where it was first found.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The absolute path to the file, or nil if the file could not be found in any of the searched directories.

Token.Abstract: The full path to the documents directory.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The full path to the documents directory.
